author: Ellie Harrison, Ellie Harrison
title: Love Island: New series could still go ahead despite coronavirus outbreak
description: Next series is due to film in Spain, where more than 2,500 people have died from the virus
content:
Love Island could still go ahead despite the coronavirus outbreak, with ITV bosses making no moves to announce the shows cancellation.
Following its first winter series in South Africa earlier this year, Love Island is set to return to its usual filming loca… [+981 chars]
